results.title: Thomastown (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Robert Newton, Lee Burton and Latrobe University. School of Education. Media Centre
results.brief_description: Thomastown High School allows students the freedom and responsibility to shape their own learning experiences and their own learning. This program is an account of the curriculum innovation at Thomastown High School, Victoria, between 1971-1982. Uses animation as well as live-action. Narrated by Lee Burton.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Newton, Lee Burton and Latrobe University. School of Education. Media Centre

results.title: Thomas the Tank Engine. Volume 3 (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Featured stories : “Coal”, “The Flying Kipper”, “Whistles and Sneezes”, Toby and the Stout Gentlemen”, “Thomas in Trouble”, “Dirty Objects “Off the Rails”, “Down the Mine”, “Thomas’ Christmas Party”. Rated: G

results.title: This way, that way, which way?
results.creator_credit: Grahame Jennings, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Grahame Jennings Productions
results.brief_description: Demonstrates right and wrong procedure for drivers and pedestrians in urban traffic, correct hand signals and use of road signs and traffic lights. Designed for children from 7 to 11 years.
